fields.title: Administrator - Server
fields.description: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on physical servers

fields.title: Administrator - Virtual Machine
fields.description: Full administrative access (root, Administrator) on virtual servers

fields.title: Debug Application
fields.description: Read only access to production application servers

fields.title: Administrator - Application
fields.description: Use of SUDO to deploy new software and restart applications

fields.title: Manage security systems
fields.description: Administrative access to systems that provide critical security services such as auditing systems or firewalls

fields.title: Perform security assessments
fields.description: perform security assessments of new or existing applications and servers
